name: pensando_psm
label: Pensando Policy Service Manager
description: Pensando's Policy and Services Manager (PSM) is a distributed system that leverages an intent-based model to deliver network and security policy to Pensando Distributed Services Cards for services implementation at the edge. This connector facilitates the automated operations related alerts, networks, hosts etc.

operations.title: debug - remove session state
operations.description: Debug login by removing session state from disk.

operations.title: debug - reset session state
operations.description: Debug login by resetting session state on disk.

operations.title: debug - expire auth cookie
operations.description: Debug login by expiring the auth cookie on disk.

operations.title: Get Network Security Policies
operations.description: Get the Network Security Policy list.

operations.title: Enable IPFIX Export for Host
operations.description: Enable IPFIX Flow Export of all flows for a source IP.

parameters.title: Host Source IP
parameters.name: host_source_ip
parameters.description: Source IP of host to enable IPFIX flow export.

parameters.title: Interval
parameters.name: interval
parameters.description: Interval defines how often to push the records to an external collector. The value is specified as a string format, '10s', '20m'. Should be a valid time duration between 1s and 24h0m0s. Example: 60s

parameters.title: Template Interval
parameters.name: template_interval
parameters.description: Template Interval defines how often to send IPFIX templates to an external collector. The value is specified as a string format, '1m', '20m'. Should be a valid time duration between 1m0s and 30m0s. Example: 15m

parameters.title: IPFIX Collector Destination IP
parameters.name: ipfix_collector_ip
parameters.description: IP address of the IPFIX Collector.

parameters.title: IPFIX Collector Destination Gateway IP
parameters.name: ipfix_collector_gw_ip
parameters.description: Gateway IP address for the IPFIX Collector.

parameters.title: IPFIX Collector Destination Protocol
parameters.name: ipfix_collector_protocol
parameters.description: Protocol of the IPFIX Collector.

parameters.title: IPFIX Collector Destination Port
parameters.name: ipfix_collector_port
parameters.description: Destination port of the IPFIX Collector.

operations.title: Delete existing IPFIX Export for Host
operations.description: Delete IPFIX Flow Export of all flows for a source IP.

parameters.title: Host Source IP
parameters.name: host_source_ip
parameters.description: Source IP of host to delete IPFIX flow export.

parameters.title: IPFIX Collector Destination IP
parameters.name: ipfix_collector_ip
parameters.description: IP address of the IPFIX Collector.

operations.title: Enable Mirror Traffic Export for Host
operations.description: Enable Mirror Traffic Export of traffic flows for a source IP.

parameters.title: Host Source IP
parameters.name: host_source_ip
parameters.description: Source IP of host to enable Mirrof Traffic export.

parameters.title: ERSPAN ID
parameters.name: erspan_id
parameters.description: Value should be between 1 and 1023.

parameters.title: Packet Size
parameters.name: packet_size
parameters.description: Max size of a mirrored packet. Packet size is not checked by default. Value should be between 64 and 2048.

parameters.title: ERSPAN Type
parameters.name: erspan_type
parameters.description: Type of ERSPAN Collector.

parameters.title: ERSPAN Collector Destination IP
parameters.name: erspan_collector_ip
parameters.description: IP address of the ERSPAN Collector.

parameters.title: ERSPAN Collector Destination Gateway IP
parameters.name: erspan_collector_gw_ip
parameters.description: Gateway IP address for the ERSPAN Collector.

parameters.title: Strip VLAN
parameters.name: strip_vlan
parameters.description: Remove VLAN from mirrored packets.

parameters.title: Match Destination IP Addresses
parameters.name: erspan_match_dest_ip
parameters.description: Destination IPs to match for mirrored packets. Can be a comma seperated list or a JSON Array. e.g. '10.1.1.1, 192.168.1.1' or '["10.1.1.1", "192.168.1.1"]'

parameters.title: Match Protocols and Ports
parameters.name: erspan_match_protocols
parameters.description: Protocols and ports/port ranges to match for mirrored packets. Can be a comma seperated list or a JSON Array. e.g. 'any, icmp, udp/500, tcp/80-88' or '["any", "icmp, udp/500", "tcp/80-88"]'

operations.title: Delete Existing Mirror Traffic Export for Host
operations.description: Delete ERSPAN Mirror Traffic Export for a source IP.

parameters.title: Host Source IP
parameters.name: host_source_ip
parameters.description: Source IP of host to delete Mirror Traffic export.

parameters.title: ERSPAN Collector Destination IP
parameters.name: erspan_collector_ip
parameters.description: IP address of the ERSPAN Collector.

operations.title: Isolate Host
operations.description: Quarantine a Host. (Disallow all North/South/East/West inbound and outbound traffic)

parameters.title: Host Source IP
parameters.name: host_source_ip
parameters.description: Source IP of host to isolate.

operations.title: Unisolate Host
operations.description: Remove Host quarantine. (Remove North/South/East/West inbound and outbound traffic block)

parameters.title: Host Source IP
parameters.name: host_source_ip
parameters.description: Source IP of host to unisolate.

operations.title: Add IOC IPs to Blocklist
operations.description: Add one or more IOC IPs to a block list.

parameters.title: IOC IP Address(es)
parameters.name: ioc_ip
parameters.tooltip: comma separated list or a JSON Array.
parameters.description: IP or IPs to block. Can be a comma seperated list or a JSON Array. e.g. '10.1.1.1, 192.168.1.1' or '["10.1.1.1", "192.168.1.1"]'

operations.title: Remove IOC IPs from Blocklist
operations.description: Remove one or more IOC IPs from a block list.

parameters.title: IOC IP Address(es)
parameters.name: ioc_ip
parameters.description: IP or IPs to remove from the blocklist. Can be a comma seperated list or a JSON Array. e.g. '10.1.1.1, 192.168.1.1' or '["10.1.1.1", "192.168.1.1"]'

operations.title: Remove IOC Blocklist
operations.description: Entirely remove the IOC block list.
